T02udanav_u:1.1_0: stīnam iddham vinodya iha sampraharṣya ca mānasam /[stīnamiddham]
T02udanav_u:1.1_1: śṛṇuta imam pravakṣyāmi udānam jina bhāṣitam //
T02udanav_u:1.2_0: evam uktam bhagavatā sarva abhijñena tāyinā /
T02udanav_u:1.3_0: anityā bata saṃskārā utpāda vyaya dharmiṇaḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.3_1: utpadya hi nirudhyante teṣām vyupaśamaḥ sukham //
T02udanav_u:1.4_0: ko nu harṣaḥ ka;ānanda;evam prajvalite sati /
T02udanav_u:1.4_1: andha kāram praviṣṭāḥ stha pradīpam na gaveṣatha //
T02udanav_u:1.5_0: yāni imāny apaviddhāni vikṣiptāni diśo diśam /
T02udanav_u:1.5_1: kapota varṇāny asthīni tāni drṣṭvā iha kā ratiḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.6_0: yām eva prathamām rātrim garbhe vasati mānavaḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.6_1: aviṣṭhitaḥ sa vrajati gataś ca na nivartate //
T02udanav_u:1.7_0: sāyam eke na dṛśyante kālyam dṛṣṭā mahā janāḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.7_1: kālyam ca eke na dṛṣyante sāyam dṛṣṭā mahā janāḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.8_0: tatra ko viśvasen martyo daharo asmi iti jīvite /
T02udanav_u:1.8_1: daharā api ṃriyante hi narā nāryaś ca n.ekaśaḥ //[.anekaśaḥ.]
T02udanav_u:1.9_0: garbha;eke vinaśyante tathā eke sūtikā kule /
T02udanav_u:1.9_1: parisṛptās tathā hy eke tathā eke paridhāvinaḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.10_0: ye ca vṛddhā ye ca dahrā ye ca madhyama puruṣāḥ /[.pūruṣāḥ.]
T02udanav_u:1.10_1: anupūrvam pravrajanti phalam pakvam va bandhanāt //
T02udanav_u:1.11_0: yathā phalānām pakvānām nityam patanato bhayam /
T02udanav_u:1.11_1: evam jātasya martyasya nityam maraṇato bhayam //
T02udanav_u:1.12_0: yathā api kumbha kāreṇa mṛttikā bhājanam kṛtam /
T02udanav_u:1.12_1: sarvam bhedana paryantam evam martyasya jīvitam //
T02udanav_u:1.13_0: yathā api tantre vitate yad yad uktam samupyate /
T02udanav_u:1.13_1: alpam bhavati vātavyam evam martyasya jīvitam //
T02udanav_u:1.15_0: yathā nadī pārvatīyā gacchate na nivartate /
T02udanav_u:1.15_1: evam āyur manuṣyāṇām gacchate na nivartate //
T02udanav_u:1.16_0: kisaram ca parittam ca tac ca duhkhena samyutam /
T02udanav_u:1.16_1: udake daṇḍa rājī iva kṣipram eva vinaśyati //
T02udanav_u:1.17_0: yathā daṇḍena gopālo gāḥ prāpayati gocaram /
T02udanav_u:1.17_1: evam rogair jarā mṛtyuḥ āyuḥ prāpayate nṛṇām //
T02udanav_u:1.18_0: atiyānti hy aho rātrā jīvitam ca uparudhyate /
T02udanav_u:1.18_1: āyuḥ kṣīyati martyānām kunadīṣu yathā odakam //
T02udanav_u:1.19_0: dīrghā jāgarato rātrir dīrgham śrāntasya yojanam /
T02udanav_u:1.20_0: putro me asti dhanam me asti ity evam bālo vihanyate /
T02udanav_u:1.20_1: ātmā eva hy ātmano na asti kasya putraḥ kuto dhanam //
T02udanav_u:1.21_0: anekāni sahasrāṇi nara nārī śatāni ca /
T02udanav_u:1.21_1: bhogān vai samudānīya vaśam gacchanti mṛtyunaḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.22_0: sarve kṣaya antā nicayāḥ patana antāḥ samucchrayāḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.22_1: samyogā viprayoga antā maraṇa antam hi jīvitam //
T02udanav_u:1.23_0: sarve sattvā mariṣyanti maraṇa antam hi jīvitam /[.satvā.]
T02udanav_u:1.23_1: yathā karma gamiṣyanti puṇya pāpa phala upagāḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.24_0: narakam pāpa karmāṇaḥ kṛta puṇyās tu sad gatim /
T02udanav_u:1.24_1: anye tu mārgam bhāvya iha nirvāsyanti nirāsravāḥ //[.bhāvyeha.]
T02udanav_u:1.25_0: na eva antarīk se na samudra madhye na parvatānām vivaram praviśya /
T02udanav_u:1.25_1: na vidyate asau pṛthivī pradeśo yatra sthitam na prasaheta mṛtyuH //
T02udanav_u:1.26_0: ye ca iha bhūtā bhaviṣyanti vā punaḥ sarve gamiṣyanti prahāya deham /
T02udanav_u:1.26_1: tām sarva hānim kuśalo viditvā dharme sthito brahmacaryam careta //
T02udanav_u:1.27_0: jīrṇam ca dṛṣṭvā iha tathā eva rogiṇam mṛtam ca dṛṣṭvā vyapayāta cetasam /
T02udanav_u:1.27_1: jahau sa dhīro gṛha bandhanāni kāmā hi lokasya na supraheyāḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.28_0: jīryanti vai rāja rathāḥ sucitrā hy atho śarīram api jarām upaiti /
T02udanav_u:1.28_1: satām tu dharmo na jarām upaiti santo hi tam satsu nivedayanti
T02udanav_u:1.29_0: dhik tvām astu jare grāmye virūpa karaṇī hy asi /
T02udanav_u:1.29_1: tathā mano ramam bimbam jarayā hy abhimarditam //
T02udanav_u:1.30_0: yo api varṣa śatam jīvet so api mṛtyu parāyaṇaḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.30_1: anu hy enam jarā hanti vyādhir vā yadi vā antakaḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.31_0: sadā vrajanti hy anivartamānā divā ca rātrau ca vilujyamānāḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.31_1: matsyā;iva atīva hi tapyamānā duhkhena jāti maraṇena yuktāḥ //
T02udanav_u:1.32_0: āyur divā ca rātrau ca caratas tiṣṭhatas tathā /
T02udanav_u:1.32_1: nadīnām vā yathā sroto gacchate na nivartate //
T02udanav_u:1.33_0: yeṣām rātri diva apāye hy āyur alpataram bhavet /
T02udanav_u:1.33_1: alpa udake va matsyānām kā nu teṣām ratir bhavet //
T02udanav_u:1.34_0: parijīrṇam idam rūpam roga nīḍam prabhaṅguram /
T02udanav_u:1.34_1: bhetsyate pūty asaṃdeham maraṇa antam hi jīvitam //
T02udanav_u:1.35_0: aciram bata kāyo ayam pṛthivīm adhiśeṣyate /
T02udanav_u:1.35_1: śunyo vyapeta vijñāno nirastam vā kaḍaṅgaram //[.śūnyo.]
T02udanav_u:1.36_0: kim anena śarīreṇa sravatā pūutinā sadā /
T02udanav_u:1.36_1: nityam roga abhibhūtena jarā maraṇa bhīruṇā //
T02udanav_u:1.37_0: anena pūti kāyena hy ātureṇa prabhaṅguṇā /
T02udanav_u:1.37_1: nigacchatha parām śāntim yoga kṣemam anuttaram //
T02udanav_u:1.38_0: iha varṣam kariṣyāmi hemantam grīṣmam eva ca /
T02udanav_u:1.38_1: bālo vicintayaty evam antarāyam na paśyati //
T02udanav_u:1.39_0: tam putra paśu sammattam vyāsakta manasam naram /
T02udanav_u:1.39_1: sutpam grāmam mahaugha eva mṛtyur ādāya gacchati //[mahaughaiva]
T02udanav_u:1.40_0: na santi putrās trāṇāya na pitā na api bāndhavāḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.40_1: antakena abhibhūtasya na hi trāṇā bhavanti te //
T02udanav_u:1.41_0: idam kṛtam me kartavyam idam kṛtvā bhaviṣyati /
T02udanav_u:1.41_1: ity evam spandato martyān jarā mṛtyuś ca mardati //
T02udanav_u:1.42_0: tasmāt sadā dhyāna ratāḥ samāhitā hy ātāpino jāti jarā anta darśinaḥ /
T02udanav_u:1.42_1: māram sasainyam hy abhibhūya bhikṣavo bhaveta jātī maraṇasya pāragāḥ //
T02udanav_u:2.1_0: kāma jānāmi te mūlam saṃkalpāt kāma jāyase /
T02udanav_u:2.1_1: na tvām saṃkalpayiṣyāmi tato me na bhaviṣyasi //
T02udanav_u:2.2_0: kāmebhyo jāyate śokaḥ kāmebhyo jāyate bhayam /
T02udanav_u:2.2_1: kāmebhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T02udanav_u:2.3_0: ratibhyo jāyate śoko ratibhyo jāyate bhayam /
T02udanav_u:2.3_1: ratibhhyo vipramuktānām na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T02udanav_u:2.4_0: madhura agrā vipāke tu kaṭukā hy abhinanditāḥ /
T02udanav_u:2.4_1: kāmā dahanti vai bālān ulkā iva amuñcataḥ karam //
T02udanav_u:2.5_0: na tad dṛḍham bandhanam āhur āryā yad āyasam dāravam balbajam vā
T02udanav_u:2.5_1: saṃrakta cittasya hi manda buddheḥ putreṣu dāreṣu ca yā;avekṣā
T02udanav_u:2.6_0: etad dṛḍham bandhanam āhur āryāḥ samantataḥ susthiram duṣpramokṣam /
T02udanav_u:2.6_1: etad api chittvā tu parivrajanti hy anapekṣiṇaḥ kāma sukham prahāya //
T02udanav_u:2.7_0: na te kāmā yāni citrāṇi loke saṃkalpa rāgaḥ puruṣasya kāmaḥ /
T02udanav_u:2.7_1: tiṣṭhanti citrāṇi tathā eva loke;atha atra dhīrā vinayanti chandam //[cchandam]
T02udanav_u:2.8_0: na santi nityā manujeṣu kāmāḥ santi tv anityāḥ kāmino yatra baddhāḥ /
T02udanav_u:2.8_1: tāṃs tu prahāya hy apunar bhavāya hy anāgatam mṛtyu dheyam vadāmi //
T02udanav_u:2.9_0: chanda jāto hy avasrāvī manasā anāvilo bhavet /
T02udanav_u:2.9_1: kāmeṣu tv apratibaddha citta;ūrdhva sroto nirucyate //
T02udanav_u:2.10_0: anupūrveṇa medhāvī stokam stokam kṣaṇe kṣaṇe /
T02udanav_u:2.10_1: karmāro rajatasya eva nirdhamen malam ātmanaḥ //
T02udanav_u:2.11_1: yad yaj jahāti kāmānām tat tat sampadyate sukham //
T02udanav_u:2.12_0: sarvam cet sukham iccheta sarva kāmān parityajet /[.kāmām.]
T02udanav_u:2.12_1: sarva kāma parityāgī hy atyantam sukham edhate //
T02udanav_u:2.13_0: yāvat kāmān anusaran na tṛptim manaso adhyagāt /
T02udanav_u:2.13_1: tato nivṛttim pratipaśyamānās te vai tṛptāḥ prajñayā ye sutṛptāḥ //
T02udanav_u:2.14_0: śreyasī prajñayā tṛptir na hi kāmair vitṛpyate /
T02udanav_u:2.14_1: prajñayā puruṣam tṛptam tṛṣṇā na kurute vaśam //
T02udanav_u:2.15_0: gṛddhā hi kāmeṣu narāḥ pramattā hy adharme bata te ratāḥ /
T02udanav_u:2.15_1: antarāyam na te paśyanty alpake jīvite sati /
T02udanav_u:2.16_0: durmedhasam hanti bhogo na tv iha ātma gaveṣiṇam /
T02udanav_u:2.16_1: durmedhā bhoga tṛṣṇābhir hanty ātmānam atho parān //
T02udanav_u:2.17_0: na karṣāpaṇa varṣeṇa tṛptiḥ kāmair hi vidyate /
T02udanav_u:2.17_1: alpa āsvāda sukhāḥ kāmā;iti vijñāya paṇḍitaḥ //
T02udanav_u:2.18_0: api divyeṣu kāmeṣu sa ratim na adhigacchati /
T02udanav_u:2.18_1: tṛṣṇā kṣaya rato bhavati buddhānām śrāvakaḥ sadā //
T02udanav_u:2.19_0: parvato api suvarṇasya samo himavatā bhavet /
T02udanav_u:2.19_1: vittam tam nālam ekasya etaj jñātvā samam caret //[vittam tam na alam ekasya]
T02udanav_u:2.20_0: duhkham hi yo veda yato nidānam kāmeṣu jantu sa katham rameta /
T02udanav_u:2.20_1: upadhim hi loke śalyam iti matvā tasya eva dhīro vinayāya śikṣet //
T02udanav_u:3.1_0: vitarka pramathitasya jantunas tīvra rāgasya śubha anudarśinaḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.1_1: bhūyas tṛṣṇā pravardhate gāḍham hy eṣa karoti bandhanam //
T02udanav_u:3.2_0: vitarka vyupaśame tu yo rato hy aśubham bhāvayate sadā smṛtaḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.2_1: tṛṣṇā hy eṣa prahāsyate sa tu khalu pūti karoti bandhanam //[eṣā]?
T02udanav_u:3.3_0: kāma andha jāla prakṣiptās tṛṣṇayā ācchāditāḥ prajāḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.3_1: pramattā bandhane baddhā matsyavat kupinā mukhe /
T02udanav_u:3.3_2: jarā maraṇam āyānti vatsaḥ kṣīrapaka;iva mātaram //
T02udanav_u:3.4_0: manujasya pramatta cāriṇas tṛṣṇā vardhati mālutā iva hi /[māluteva hi]
T02udanav_u:3.4_1: sa hi saṃsarate punaḥ punaḥ phalam icchann iva vānaro vane //
T02udanav_u:3.5_0: saritāni vai snehitāni vai saumanasyāni bhavanti jantunaḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.5_1: ye sātasitāḥ sukha eṣiṇas te vai jāti jarā upagā narāḥ //
T02udanav_u:3.6_0: tṛṣṇābhir upaskṛtāḥ prajāḥ paridhāvanti śaśā va vāgurām /
T02udanav_u:3.6_1: samyojanaiḥ saṅga saktā duhkham yānti punaḥ punaś cira rātram //
T02udanav_u:3.7_0: tṛṣṇayā grathitāḥ sattvā rakta cittā bhavā bhave /[.satvā.]
T02udanav_u:3.7_1: te yoga yukta māreṇa hy ayoga kṣemiṇo janāḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.7_2: jarā maraṇam āyānti yogā hi duratikramāḥ //
T02udanav_u:3.8_0: yas tu tṛṣṇām prahāya iha vīta tṛṣṇo bhavā bhave /
T02udanav_u:3.9_0: ya;etām sahate grāmyām tṛṣṇām loke sudustyajām /
T02udanav_u:3.9_1: śokās tasya pravardhante hy avavṛṣṭā bīraṇā yathā //
T02udanav_u:3.10_0: yas tv etām tyajate grāmyām tṛṣṇām loke sudustyajām /
T02udanav_u:3.10_1: śokās tasya nivartante;uda bindur iva puṣkarāt //
T02udanav_u:3.11_0: tad vai vadāmi bhadram vo yāvantaḥ stha samāgatāḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.11_1: tṛṣṇām samūlam khanata uśīra arthī iva bīraṇām /
T02udanav_u:3.11_2: tṛṣṇāyāḥ khāta mūlāyā na asti śokaḥ kuto bhayam //
T02udanav_u:3.12_0: tṛṣṇā dvitīyaḥ puruṣo dīrgham adhvānam āśayā /
T02udanav_u:3.12_1: punaḥ punaḥ saṃsarate garbham eti punaḥ punaḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.12_2: ittham bhāva anyathī bhāvaḥ saṃsāre tv āgatim gatim //
T02udanav_u:3.13_0: tām tu tṛṣṇām prahāya iha vīta tṛṣṇo bhavā bhave /
T02udanav_u:3.13_1: na asau punaḥ saṃsarate tṛṣṇā hy asya na vidyate //
T02udanav_u:3.14_0: yayā devā manuṣyāś ca sitās tiṣṭhanti hārthikāḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.14_1: tarata etām viṣaktikām kṣaṇo vo mā hy upatyagāt /
T02udanav_u:3.14_2: kṣaṇa atītā hi śocante narakeṣu samarpitāḥ //
T02udanav_u:3.15_0: tṛṣṇā hi hetuḥ saritā viṣaktikā gaṇḍasya nityam visṛtā iha jālinī /
T02udanav_u:3.15_1: latām pipāsām apanīya sarvaśo nivartate duhkham idam punaḥ punaḥ //
T02udanav_u:3.16_0: yathā api mūlair anupadrutaiḥ sadā chinno api vṛkṣaḥ punar eva jāyate /
T02udanav_u:3.16_1: evam hi tṛṣṇā anuśayair anuddhṛtair nirvartate duhkham idam punaḥ punaḥ //
T02udanav_u:3.17_0: yathā api śalyo dṛḍham ātmanā kṛtas tam eva hanyād balasā tv adhiṣṭhitaḥ /
T02udanav_u:3.17_1: tathā tv iha ādhyātma samutthitā latās tṛṣṇā vadhāya upanayanti prāṇinām
T02udanav_u:3.18_0: etad ādīnavam jñātvā tṛṣṇā duhkhasya sambhavam /
T02udanav_u:3.18_1: vīta tṛṣṇo hy anādānaḥ smṛto bhikṣuḥ parivrajet //
T02udanav_u:4.1_0: apramādo hy amṛta padam pramādo mṛtyunaḥ padam /
T02udanav_u:4.1_1: apramattā na ṃriyante ye pramattāḥ sadā mṛtāḥ //
T02udanav_u:4.2_0: etām viśeṣatām jñātvā hy apramādasya paṇḍitaḥ /
T02udanav_u:4.2_1: apramādam pramudyeta nityam āryaḥ sva gocaram //
T02udanav_u:4.3_1: spṛśanti dhīrā nirvāṇam yoga kṣemam anuttaram //
T02udanav_u:4.4_1: prajñā prasādam āruhya tv aśokaḥ śokinīm prajām /
T02udanav_u:4.4_2: parvatasthā eva bhūmisthān dhīro bālān avekṣate //
T02udanav_u:4.5_1: dvīpam karoti medhāvī tam ogho na abhimardati //
T02udanav_u:4.6_0: utthānavataḥ smṛta ātmanaḥ śubha cittasya niśāmya cāriṇaḥ /
T02udanav_u:4.6_1: samyatasya hi dharma jīvino hy apramattasya yaśo abhivardhate //
T02udanav_u:4.7_0: adhicetasi mā pramadyata pratatam mauna padeṣu śikṣata /
T02udanav_u:4.7_1: śokā na bhavanti tāyino hy upaśāntasya sadā smṛta ātmanaḥ //
T02udanav_u:4.8_0: hīnām dharmām na seveta pramādena na saṃvaset /
T02udanav_u:4.8_1: mithyā dṛṣṭim na roceta na bhavel loka vardhanaḥ //
T02udanav_u:4.9_0: samyag dṛṣṭir adhīmātrā laukikī yasya vidyate /
T02udanav_u:4.9_1: api jāti sahasrāṇi na asau gacchati durgatim //
T02udanav_u:4.10_1: apramādam tu medhāvī dhanam śreṣṭhī iva rakṣati //
T02udanav_u:4.11_1: apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy āsrava kṣayam //
T02udanav_u:4.12_0: pramādam na anuyujyeta na kāma rati saṃstavam /
T02udanav_u:4.12_1: apramattaḥ sadā dhyāyī prāpnute hy acalam sukham //
T02udanav_u:4.13_0: na ayam pramāda kālaḥ syād aprāpte hy āsrava kṣaye /
T02udanav_u:4.13_1: māraḥ pramattam anveti siṃham vā mṛga mātṛkā //
